item.title: Is the there a auto donate guide?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:2, topic:397013”]What is the revision/base? If this is a PI, you can add a command to make it go to a website where you donate. Look at this code:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000); }

Now if a player types ::vote, it will take them to www.google.com You may add this code into command.cfg or commands.cfg I forgot(Server sided). Just change www.google.com to the website you want them to go to. Now to add a repeating message, open up client.java and add this void:

public void mymessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sendMessage("[@red@SERVER NOTICE@bla@]: Your server message here"); } }, 100000); //Time it takes to send the message };

And after you add that code, find:

And under that add:

mymessage();[/quote]Credits to me.

Read full topic
item.source: Is the there a auto donate guide?

item.title: Is the there a auto donate guide?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

What is the revision/base? If this is a PI, you can add a command to make it go to a website where you donate. Look at this code:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000); }

Now if a player types ::vote, it will take them to www.google.com You may add this code into command.cfg or commands.cfg I forgot(Server sided). Just change www.google.com to the website you want them to go to. Now to add a repeating message, open up client.java and add this void:

public void mymessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sendMessage("[@red@SERVER NOTICE@bla@]: Your server message here"); } }, 100000); //Time it takes to send the message };

And after you add that code, find:

And under that add:

Thank Uncalled for his tutorial on this.
